databaseConfig.sql: SELECT SI_NENJI_SHIME.SI_NENJI_SHIME_ID , SI_NENJI_SHIME.NEN , SI_NENJI_SHIME.MS_USER_ID , SI_NENJI_SHIME.SEND_FLAG , SI_NENJI_SHIME.VESSEL_ID , SI_NENJI_SHIME.DATA_NO , SI_NENJI_SHIME.USER_KEY , SI_NENJI_SHIME.RENEW_DATE , SI_NENJI_SHIME.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_NENJI_SHIME.TS FROM SI_NENJI_SHIME

SELECT SI_NENJI_SHIME.SI_NENJI_SHIME_ID , SI_NENJI_SHIME.NEN , SI_NENJI_SHIME.MS_USER_ID , SI_NENJI_SHIME.SEND_FLAG , SI_NENJI_SHIME.VESSEL_ID , SI_NENJI_SHIME.DATA_NO , SI_NENJI_SHIME.USER_KEY , SI_NENJI_SHIME.RENEW_DATE , SI_NENJI_SHIME.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_NENJI_SHIME.TS FROM SI_NENJI_SHIME WHERE SI_NENJI_SHIME.SI_NENJI_SHIME_ID = :SI_NENJI_SHIME_ID

SELECT SI_NENJI_SHIME.SI_NENJI_SHIME_ID , SI_NENJI_SHIME.NEN , SI_NENJI_SHIME.MS_USER_ID , SI_NENJI_SHIME.SEND_FLAG , SI_NENJI_SHIME.VESSEL_ID , SI_NENJI_SHIME.DATA_NO , SI_NENJI_SHIME.USER_KEY , SI_NENJI_SHIME.RENEW_DATE , SI_NENJI_SHIME.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_NENJI_SHIME.TS FROM SI_NENJI_SHIME WHERE NEN IN ( SELECT max(NEN) FROM SI_NENJI_SHIME )

INSERT INTO SI_NENJI_SHIME ( SI_NENJI_SHIME_ID , NEN , MS_USER_ID , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES ( :SI_NENJI_SHIME_ID , :NEN , :MS_USER_ID , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_NENJI_SHIME SET NEN =:NEN , MS_USER_ID =:MS_USER_ID , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_NENJI_SHIME_ID =:SI_NENJI_SHIME_ID
